name: Enlightened IT Developers
tag_list: magento-developer, ecommerce-expert, website-design, magento-designer, joomla-designer, prestashop-expert-
overview:
Best Ecommerce websites Designed, Customized And Developed on Magento, Prestashop and Joomla Platforms By Expert Developers.

Our ecommerce solutions are built for small and large enterprises and is suitable for both B2C & B2B organizations.

Our ecommerce platforms are built on Magento, Joomla, Prestashop, Zencart and Oscommerce.

Our Ecommerce Expert Developers, Handle:

  1. Customization to the core functionalities.
  2. Custom build extensions and modules.
  3. Integration with Ebay, Facebook, Quickbooks and Amazon.
  4. Integration with Fedex, UPS and other shipping methods.
  5. Integration with Authorize, Paypal, EBS, World Pay, Payment Sense, First Data, and other payment gateways.
  6. Data migration from oscommerce, zencart, virtuemart to magento.
  7. Search engine optimization of your ecommerce websites.
